title: Got a 14 day ban and it still says 14 days when I hover over the play button.
body: It's been 12 days since I have received my ban and I am wondering why I have not gotten an email or why it still says 14 days at the top left when I click over play/lobby. Please help just wondering if I need to do a certain thing to make sure the 14 days actually count down.

replies.body: The days are being counted, it's just that message you're seeing isn't a countdown message. It's just there to let you know what the punishment was. Looks like you'll be able to play again no later than the 25th.
